summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 8, 2019, primarily consisting of inmate rosters, out-count sheets, and official count slips. The most significant entry is the inclusion of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on an attorney visit roster, placing him at the facility on the day before his death.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Rosters
events.description: Administrative record of inmate counts, out-counts, and roster assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) is documented as being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 8, 2019.
Epstein is listed on an 'ATTY' (attorney visit) roster, indicating he had or was scheduled for a legal visit that day.
The document is dated August 8, 2019, which is the day before Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 9, 2019.
The forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative records for tracking inmate location and population counts.
Multiple other inmates are listed across various housing units and assignments (e.g., HOSP, FNYE, FNYS, FS, ATTY).
